More Robotics at Cal

As you may well know, UC Berkeley is a very exciting place for roboticists! There is an immense amount of cutting-edge robotics research here that constantly advances the broad and diverse fields that robotics spans. From self-driving cars to robotic surgery, intelligent laundry-folding robots to machines that mimic animal motions, the projects that Berkeley minds work on every day exceed many roboticistsâ€™ wildest dreams.

We are just one tiny part of this expansive and amazing community of roboticists at UC Berkeley; click on the options to the left to learn about some other UC Berkeley robotics groups that we admire.
